WebProjects.name: Obsidian
WebProjects.description: This is a clone of the Obsidian website, made for improving my developing skills. It is the landing page of the site. I tried to made this page without seeing the original html because i thought that doing it this way would make it harder to clone.
WebProjects.opinion: Obsidian its a software that i like very much, i really recommend you to try it!
